amendment.description: An amendment numbered 24 printed in Part B of House Report 118-30 to expand the definition of "hazard trees" identified and removed along electric power lines as part of a utility's vegetation management plan to trees within 50 feet, from 10 feet. Such plans will also be automatically approved after 60 days.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. LaMalfa.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
